HOME.question: needs a wash?
HOME.caption: You have the car we have the expertise

contentIntro.qc: We are proudly made in Quebec!

eco.title: Eco Friendly
eco.details: We use eco friendly product in all our washed, they are designed not to harm nature. We also use technologies that uses 45% less water than other companies and 80% less than you washing your car.

experimental.title: Experimental
experimental.details: As mentionned before we use the best technology in the industry straight from the USA our machinery and products are made to make your car look as new as it could be.

relaxing.title: Relaxing
relaxing.details: The best part is you don't have to worry about anything at all! We come, we clean and we leave. You stay in the comfort of your own house.

beloved.title: Beloved
beloved.details: Our customers are in love with our services, we give you the best of everything.

rapid.title: Rapid
rapid.details: Did you know our fastest wash is only 15 minutes? You can even enjoy our 2h full package while working, playing with your kids or practicing your hobby!

magical.title: Magical
magical.details: Do you remember that feeling when you first bought your car? That's what you're gonna get with us!

HOME.sameHome: But... It's the same as washing it myself
HOME.sameHomeCaption: Washing it yourself at phone has some disavantages as

water.title: Water Consuming
water.details: The average wash at home consumes 150L of water

pollution.title: Pollution
pollution.details: The products used at home like soap pollute the environment

scratches.title: Scratches
scratches.details: The paint of your car is 0.005 inch think, using non-professional tools may leave scratches.

CONTACT.caption: How can we help You today?
CONTACT.thanks: We'll get back to you as soon as possible!
CONTACT.errorSending: Oups something happenned, please try again later.
